segments.text: What's the rate for a station wagon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The daily rate is $ 22 per mile .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I'll take it right now , if possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I see your license , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . I have my own license and an international license .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . Fill out this form and let me see your credit card , please .
segments.speaker: S2
